name: The Experiment (itch) (Fireyoyo, Mr34)
description:
Here you are playing as a slime being held and experimented on by scientists. Show them how many humans you can infect and how many times you can multiply.

Programming and Design by Fireyoyo

Art and Music by Mr34

All the assets used in this game are made by the team except the sound effects and the font.

Links to the sound effects used:

https://freesound.org/people/DrMinky/sounds/167075/

https://freesound.org/people/Lukeo135/sounds/530615/

https://freesound.org/people/kuchenanderung1/sounds/340794/

https://freesound.org/people/DrMinky/sounds/167045/

https://freesound.org/people/CpawsMusic/sounds/437113/

https://freesound.org/people/KeyKrusher/sounds/154953/

https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/442958/

Link to the font we used:

https://www.1001fonts.com/pix-pixelfjverdana12pt-font.html
